open.title: Balwin Outage | Ballito Hills
open.description: Balwin has informed us of a network outage affecting Ballito Hills, affected clients will experience no connectivity. Balwin engineers are working on resolving this issue as soon as possible. We sincerely apologise for any inconvenience caused.
